data.title: Árpád Baricz's homepage
data.meta_description:
Name: Árpád Baricz 
Degrees: Ph.D., Dr. habil.
Date and place of birth: September 7, 1981, Gheorgheni [Gyergyószentmiklós]
Nationality: Hungarian [I am a member of the Hungarian minority in Romania, I am székely ]
Citizenship: Romanian, Hungarian
Religion: Roman Catholic [I am a member of a
data.text: The number of citations to my publications in Google Scholar is 4375 and the corresponding Hirsch index is 37. The number of total citations in Mathematical Reviews is 1567, while in Zentralblatt Math is 1774. However, in these systems the self-citations are not excluded. Thus, excluding the self-citations of all authors, in Scopus the number of [independent] citations is 2500 and the corresponding Hirsch index is 27. According to Web of Science my papers were cited 2147 times with an average 16.52 per item, while the number of independent citations is 1708 and the corresponding Hirsch index is 26. [last update: 2024.06.26]
